New Records: Garry Rodrigues scored a dramatic stoppage-time winner
Key Match Events: Garry Rodrigues scored a dramatic stoppage-time winner as Cape Verde beat Ghana 2-1
Cape Verde went ahead in the 17th minute when Dutch-born Rodrigues's shot was parried by Ghana goalkeeper Richard Ofori
Ghana equalised 11 minutes into the second half with Alexander Djiku heading home from Jordan Ayew's corner
Ghana vs Cape Verde: GOAL! Garry Rodrigues '90
Ghana vs Cape Verde: GOAL! Alexander Djiku '55
Pre-Game Insights: Ghana looking to respond after nightmare tournament last time out
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nigeria's draw with Equatorial Guinea in Group A while Egypt needed a last-gasp penalty to draw with Mozambique
Others: The match took place at the Felix Houphouet-Boigny Stadium in Abidjan
